title: Create Vibcoding Builders X community banner

title: Add social link clarity: ensure X/YouTube/LinkedIn links are consistent across header/footer and CTAs (me@jasoncochran.io, Midland, TX).

Site improvements: fix blog link 404 (redirect or placeholder), beef up contact page with direct email/calendly + short form, add services/engagements section with offerings and timelines, surface social links, and add metrics/testimonials if available.

description: Track and commit the VibeTribe banner.html updates and the exported Discord/OBS assets currently in x-community/.

title: Document terminal-first workflow for agents (zsh + lazygit + rg + Cursor)
description: Add a short section to AGENTS.md so Codex/Claude use the terminal aliases and tools Jason has set up (Ghostty terminal, Cursor editor, lazygit/yazi installed, zsh aliases).
acceptance_criteria: AGENTS.md mentions: use rg/rgs for search, lazygit/lg for git, cursor/c/cf for opening projects/files; notes that yazi is optional; keep concise.
